testimonials.title: Client Reviews
testimonials.description: Hear from those who have experienced our professional nursing care.

testimonial1.text: I needed a nurse for my elderly mother after surgery. The service was fast, professional, and kind. We didn't expect such comfort and care at home.
testimonial1.author: Petra M.

testimonial2.text: Great communication and quick response. The nurse was on time, explained everything clearly, and handled the injection smoothly. Highly recommended!
testimonial2.author: Martin K.

testimonial3.text: After my knee surgery, having a nurse come to my hotel made recovery so much easier. Professional, caring, and no hospital visits needed.
testimonial3.author: Sarah L.

testimonial4.text: The IVF injections were administered perfectly every time. The nurse was gentle, understanding, and always punctual. Thank you!
testimonial4.author: Anna V.

contacts.title: Get in Touch
contacts.description: Multiple ways to reach us - choose what works best for you

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our home nursing services

q1.question: How can I book a nurse?
q1.answer: You can book a nurse through several methods: by filling out the online booking form, calling us at +420 773 629 123, via email at nius.prague@gmail.com, or through WhatsApp/Telegram. After booking, we will contact you to confirm the appointment time.

q2.question: How quickly can a nurse arrive?
q2.answer: We strive to provide care as quickly as possible. Depending on your location in Prague and current nurse availability, we can typically arrive within 2-3 hours of confirming your booking. For planned visits, we recommend booking a nurse at least one day in advance.

q3.question: Do you visit hotels and Airbnb accommodations?
q3.answer: Yes! We regularly visit international patients staying in hotels, Airbnb, and short-term rentals throughout Prague. This is especially common for IVF patients and medical tourists needing post-surgery care. Just provide your accommodation address when booking.

q4.question: Do you work with IVF patients and fertility clinics?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We have extensive experience with IVF patients, including time-sensitive hormone injections and trigger shots. We're familiar with protocols from major Prague fertility clinics like Reprofit, ISCARE, and Gennet. We offer evening and weekend appointments for precise timing requirements.

q5.question: Can you help with post-surgery recovery for medical tourists?
q5.answer: Yes, this is one of our specialties. We provide wound care, bandage changes, drain management, hygiene assistance, and escort services for patients recovering from plastic surgery, dental procedures, or other medical treatments in Prague. We understand the unique needs of international patients.

q6.question: Do I need a medical prescription for IV therapy?
q6.answer: Yes, prescribed IV therapies require a medical prescription. Our nurses can only administer medications prescribed by a doctor. If you're interested in vitamin or hydration IVs, these can be administered without a prescription as they are considered dietary supplements.

q7.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q7.answer: We accept cash (CZK or EUR), bank transfers, and card payments. Payment is collected after service. For package deals and subscription services, we can invoice monthly. Most insurance companies do not cover home nursing, but we provide receipts for potential reimbursement.

q8.question: Do you provide services outside of Prague?
q8.answer: We primarily operate in Prague, but we can provide services in the surrounding areas (up to 30 km) by individual arrangement. For travel outside Prague, we charge an additional fee of 10 CZK/km above the base rate.

q9.question: What are your operating hours?
q9.answer: We are available 7 days a week from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM. For urgent cases and IVF injections requiring specific timing, we also offer evening/night visits by arrangement. Call +420 773 629 123 anytime for 24/7 booking.

q10.question: Do you offer long-term care for disabled patients?
q10.answer: Yes, we provide daily assistance care for disabled and chronic patients, including hygiene support, medication administration, mobility assistance, and companionship. We offer flexible subscription packages for ongoing care needs.

q11.question: Are your services covered by insurance?
q11.answer: Currently, our services are not covered by health insurance. This is a direct payment by the client. Upon request, we will issue a receipt for payment that you can use for possible claims with your insurance company if you have additional insurance for premium healthcare.

q12.question: Do I need to prepare anything before the nurse arrives?
q12.answer: For the smoothest possible visit, we recommend: having your medical prescription ready (if required), ensuring a calm and clean space for the procedure, informing us in advance about your health condition and any allergies, and having your doctor's contact information handy.

howItWorks.title: How IVF Injection Support Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Schedule your injection time - even last-minute requests accepted. Provide your hotel/accommodation address.
howItWorks.step2Desc: English-speaking nurse arrives with all supplies. We come to your hotel room, Airbnb, or home.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Nurse administers your fertility medication following your clinic's protocol. Typical visit: 15-20 minutes.

faq.title: IVF Patient Questions
faq.q1: Can you do injections at specific times like 8 PM?
faq.a1: Yes! We understand IVF timing is critical. We offer evening appointments and can accommodate specific timing requirements for trigger shots and other time-sensitive medications.
faq.q2: Do you work with major Prague IVF clinics?
faq.a2: Yes, we've worked with patients from Reprofit, ISCARE, Gennet, and other Prague fertility clinics. We're familiar with standard IVF protocols and can coordinate with your clinic if needed.
faq.q3: What if I'm staying in a hotel?
faq.a3: Perfect! We visit hotels and Airbnb accommodations throughout Prague. Just provide your hotel name and room number when booking.
faq.a4: We accept cash (CZK or EUR), bank transfer, or card payment. Payment is collected after service.

cta.title: Ready to Book Your IVF Injection Support?
cta.description: Don't stress about injection timing during your IVF cycle. Our experienced nurses are here to help.

faq.title: Medical Tourist Questions
faq.q1: I'm staying at a hotel/Airbnb. Can you visit there?
faq.a1: Absolutely! We visit hotels, Airbnb accommodations, and apartments throughout Prague. This is our specialty for medical tourists.
faq.q2: Do I need Czech health insurance?
faq.a2: No. Our service is private pay - you don't need Czech insurance. We accept cash (CZK/EUR), bank transfer, or card payment.
faq.a3: Our nurses are trained to recognize complications and will coordinate with your surgeon or recommend emergency care if needed. With recovery packages, you have 24/7 phone support.
faq.q4: Can you help me with showering after surgery?
faq.a4: Yes! Hygiene assistance is included in our packages. We help with safe showering, keeping surgical sites dry, and post-shower wound care.

cta.title: Planning Surgery in Prague?
cta.description: Book your post-operative care in advance for peace of mind. We're here to support your recovery.

whoWeHelp.title: We Provide Compassionate Care For
whoWeHelp.disabledDesc: Comprehensive assistance with daily living activities, mobility, and personal care needs.
whoWeHelp.expatsDesc: English-speaking care for expats without family support or Czech language skills.
whoWeHelp.chronicDesc: Regular support for patients managing ongoing health conditions requiring daily care.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I have the same nurse each visit?
faq.a1: Yes! With our monthly subscription, we assign a consistent caregiver who gets to know your needs and preferences. This creates continuity and comfort.
faq.q2: What if I need help with intimate care?
faq.a2: Our nurses are professionally trained in all aspects of personal care, including bathing, toileting, suppository insertion, and catheter care. We provide dignified, respectful assistance.
faq.a3: Yes! All our nurses speak English, which is especially important for expats and foreigners without Czech language skills or family support in Prague.
faq.q4: Can I adjust my monthly hours?
faq.a4: Absolutely. Monthly subscriptions are flexible. If you need more or fewer hours, we can adjust your plan. Unused hours can roll over or be credited.
faq.q5: What areas of Prague do you serve?
faq.a5: We serve all Prague districts and surrounding areas up to 30km from city center. Travel is included in all pricing.

cta.title: Ready to Schedule Daily Care?
cta.description: Experience compassionate, professional nursing care in the comfort of your home. We're here to help.
